#summary Tutorials for FreeMat

= Introduction =

Home for community written tutorials for FreeMat


= Details =

Here's the first Freemat tutorial.  This is not complete (Version 0.9), but Version 1.0 will be coming soon:

* [http://home.comcast.net/~garystar1/freemat_primer.pdf The Freemat Primer] (Ver 0.9, PDF format)

* [http://home.comcast.net/~garystar1/freemat_primer.odt The Freemat Primer] (Ver 0.9, OpenOffice format)

Here are some Matlab-based tutorials:
  * [http://edu.levitas.net/Tutorials/Matlab/index.html Matlab Tutorial by T. Nguyen] - very good
  * [http://www.mathworks.com/access/helpdesk/help/techdoc/matlab.html Matlab Online Documentation] - looks like the entire Matlab documentation is online too.
